description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Sanming Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Sanming Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年在中国发生的一场大规模的政治运动。
description.en: A large-scale political movement that occurred in China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Sanming Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Sanming Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the Sanming Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的业务上级是福建省人民政府。
description.en: The operational superior of the Sanming Municipal People's Government is the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的组织上级是三明市人民代表大会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Sanming Municipal People's Government is the Sanming Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.target: 三明市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 三明市人民政府的组织上级是三明市人民代表大会常务委员会。
description.en: The organizational superior of the Sanming Municipal People's Government is the Standing Committee of the Sanming Municipal People's Congress.

relationships.source: 中国共产党三明市人民政府党组
relationships.target: 中国共产党三明市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党三明市人民政府党组的上级是中共三明市委。
description.en: The superior of the Party Leadership Group of the Sanming Municipal People's Government is the Sanming Municipal Committee of the CPC.

relationships.target: 福建省人民政府第七行政督察专员公署

description.zh-cn: 1950年2月，福建省人民政府在永安县设立福建省人民政府第七行政督察专员公署。
description.en: In February 1950, the Fujian Provincial People's Government established the Seventh Administrative Inspector Commissioner's Office in Yong'an County.

relationships.source: 福建省人民政府第七行政督察专员公署
relationships.target: 福建省人民政府永安行政督察专员公署

description.zh-cn: 1950年4月，福建省人民政府第七行政督察专员公署改称为福建省人民政府永安行政督察专员公署。
description.en: In April 1950, the Seventh Administrative Inspector Commissioner's Office was renamed the Yong'an Administrative Inspector Commissioner's Office of the Fujian Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 三明重工业建设委员会

description.zh-cn: 1957年，中共中央决定在三明进行重工业基地建设，促成了1958年三明重工业建设委员会的组建。
description.en: In 1957, the CPC Central Committee decided to build a heavy industry base in Sanming, which led to the establishment of the Sanming Heavy Industry Construction Committee in 1958.

relationships.source: 三明重工业建设委员会

description.zh-cn: 三明重工业建设委员会直属中共福建省委领导。
description.en: The Sanming Heavy Industry Construction Committee was directly under the leadership of the Fujian Provincial Committee of the CPC.

relationships.source: 三明重工业建设委员会

description.zh-cn: 三明重工业建设委员会直属福建省人民委员会（即福建省人民政府）领导。
description.en: The Sanming Heavy Industry Construction Committee was directly under the leadership of the Fujian Provincial People's Committee (i.e., Fujian Provincial People's Government).

relationships.source: 三明重工业建设委员会
relationships.target: 三明人民公社筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 1959年2月，三明重工业建设委员会与三明县合并，成立三明人民公社筹备委员会。
description.en: In February 1959, the Sanming Heavy Industry Construction Committee merged with Sanming County to form the Sanming People's Commune Preparatory Committee.

relationships.source: 三明人民公社筹备委员会

description.zh-cn: 1960年1月，三明人民公社筹备委员会改为三明市人民委员会。
description.en: In January 1960, the Sanming People's Commune Preparatory Committee was changed to the Sanming Municipal People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1966年文化大革命开始后，三明专员公署机关受到冲击，其职能后被取代。
description.en: After the Cultural Revolution began in 1966, the Sanming Commissioner's Office was impacted, and its functions were later replaced.

description.zh-cn: 1968年10月25日，三明专区革命委员会成立，取代了原三明专署机构职能。
description.en: On October 25, 1968, the Sanming Special District Revolutionary Committee was established, replacing the functions of the former Sanming Commissioner's Office.

description.zh-cn: 1970年12月，三明专区革命委员会改称三明地区革命委员会。
description.en: In December 1970, the Sanming Special District Revolutionary Committee was renamed the Sanming Prefectural Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1978年3月29日，三明地区革命委员会被撤销，设立三明地区行政公署。
description.en: On March 29, 1978, the Sanming Prefectural Revolutionary Committee was abolished, and the Sanming Prefectural Administrative Office was established.

description.zh-cn: 1983年4月，撤销三明地区行政公署建制，实行地市合并，后于同年5月正式成立三明市人民政府。
description.en: In April 1983, the Sanming Prefectural Administrative Office was abolished and the prefecture and city were merged, leading to the formal establishment of the Sanming Municipal People's Government in May of the same year.
